reviewText: Spacey as a harrowing Darrow?  Sorry, I couldn't help myself.  Amazing performance.  Story has true history, not just the positive musings that appear in one-man plays on stage that contain only famous quotations.
Underrated movie from Kevin Spacey - Enough said!

The play INHERIT THE WIND, recently played by The Old Vic, is based on one of his cases, where he defended the scool-teacher, who taught Darwinism in his class - Evolution versus Creation - a discussion that still goes on to-day.
This DVD tells the story of Darrows'life seen through the eyes of his son. He is portraied by Kevin Spacey who always delivers performances worth seeing.
